refnamediv.refpurpose: Implementation of the calendar CORBA client interface.

refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis

refsect2.title: e_data_cal_construct ()
refsect2.para: Constructs a calendar client interface object by binding the corresponding CORBA object to it. The calendar interface is bound to the specified backend, and will notify the listener about changes to the calendar.

listitem.simpara: Calendar backend that this cal presents an interface to.
The same object as the cal argument.

refsect2.title: e_data_cal_new ()
refsect2.para: Creates a new calendar client interface object and binds it to the specified backend and listener objects.

listitem.simpara: A newly-created EDataCal calendar client interface object, or NULL if its corresponding CORBA object could not be created.

refsect2.title: e_data_cal_get_backend ()
refsect2.para: Gets the associated backend.

refsect2.title: e_data_cal_get_listener ()
refsect2.para: Gets the listener associated with a calendar client interface.

refsect2.title: e_data_cal_notify_read_only ()
refsect2.para: Notifies listeners of the completion of the is_read_only method call.

refsect2.title: e_data_cal_notify_cal_address ()
refsect2.para: Notifies listeners of the completion of the get_cal_address method call.

refsect2.title: e_data_cal_notify_alarm_email_address ()
refsect2.programlisting: void e_data_cal_notify_alarm_email_address (EDataCal *cal, GNOME_Evolution_Calendar_CallStatus status, const gchar *address);
refsect2.para: Notifies listeners of the completion of the get_alarm_email_address method call.

refsect2.title: e_data_cal_notify_ldap_attribute ()
refsect2.para: Notifies listeners of the completion of the get_ldap_attribute method call.

refsect2.title: e_data_cal_notify_static_capabilities ()
refsect2.programlisting: void e_data_cal_notify_static_capabilities (EDataCal *cal, GNOME_Evolution_Calendar_CallStatus status, const gchar *capabilities);
refsect2.para: Notifies listeners of the completion of the get_static_capabilities method call.

refsect2.title: e_data_cal_notify_open ()
refsect2.para: Notifies listeners of the completion of the open method call.

refsect2.title: e_data_cal_notify_remove ()
refsect2.para: Notifies listeners of the completion of the remove method call.

refsect2.title: e_data_cal_notify_object_created ()
refsect2.programlisting: void e_data_cal_notify_object_created (EDataCal *cal, GNOME_Evolution_Calendar_CallStatus status, const gchar *uid, const gchar *object);
refsect2.para: Notifies listeners of the completion of the create_object method call.

listitem.simpara: The object created as an iCalendar string.

refsect2.title: e_data_cal_notify_object_modified ()
refsect2.programlisting: void e_data_cal_notify_object_modified (EDataCal *cal, GNOME_Evolution_Calendar_CallStatus status, const gchar *old_object, const gchar *object);
refsect2.para: Notifies listeners of the completion of the modify_object method call.

listitem.simpara: The old object as an iCalendar string.
The modified object as an iCalendar string.

refsect2.title: e_data_cal_notify_object_removed ()
refsect2.programlisting: void e_data_cal_notify_object_removed (EDataCal *cal, GNOME_Evolution_Calendar_CallStatus status, const ECalComponentId *id, const gchar *old_object, const gchar *object);
refsect2.para: Notifies listeners of the completion of the remove_object method call.

listitem.simpara: The old object as an iCalendar string.
The new object as an iCalendar string. This will not be NULL only when removing instances of a recurring appointment.

refsect2.title: e_data_cal_notify_alarm_discarded ()
refsect2.para: Notifies listeners of the completion of the discard_alarm method call.

refsect2.title: e_data_cal_notify_objects_received ()
refsect2.para: Notifies listeners of the completion of the receive_objects method call.

refsect2.title: e_data_cal_notify_objects_sent ()
refsect2.programlisting: void e_data_cal_notify_objects_sent (EDataCal *cal, GNOME_Evolution_Calendar_CallStatus status, GList *users, const gchar *calobj);
refsect2.para: Notifies listeners of the completion of the send_objects method call.

listitem.simpara: An iCalendar string representing the object sent.

refsect2.title: e_data_cal_notify_default_object ()
refsect2.para: Notifies listeners of the completion of the get_default_object method call.

listitem.simpara: The default object as an iCalendar string.

refsect2.title: e_data_cal_notify_object ()
refsect2.para: Notifies listeners of the completion of the get_object method call.

listitem.simpara: The object retrieved as an iCalendar string.

refsect2.title: e_data_cal_notify_object_list ()
refsect2.para: Notifies listeners of the completion of the get_object_list method call.

refsect2.title: e_data_cal_notify_query ()
refsect2.para: Notifies listeners of the completion of the get_query method call.

refsect2.title: e_data_cal_notify_timezone_requested ()
refsect2.programlisting: void e_data_cal_notify_timezone_requested (EDataCal *cal, GNOME_Evolution_Calendar_CallStatus status, const gchar *object);
refsect2.para: Notifies listeners of the completion of the get_timezone method call.

listitem.simpara: The requested timezone as an iCalendar string.

refsect2.title: e_data_cal_notify_timezone_added ()
refsect2.para: Notifies listeners of the completion of the add_timezone method call.

refsect2.title: e_data_cal_notify_default_timezone_set ()
refsect2.para: Notifies listeners of the completion of the set_default_timezone method call.

refsect2.title: e_data_cal_notify_changes ()
refsect2.programlisting: void e_data_cal_notify_changes (EDataCal *cal, GNOME_Evolution_Calendar_CallStatus status, GList *adds, GList *modifies, GList *deletes);
refsect2.para: Notifies listeners of the completion of the get_changes method call.

refsect2.title: e_data_cal_notify_free_busy ()
refsect2.para: Notifies listeners of the completion of the get_free_busy method call.

refsect2.title: e_data_cal_notify_mode ()
refsect2.para: Notifies the listener of the results of a set_mode call.

refsect2.title: e_data_cal_notify_auth_required ()
refsect2.para: Notifies listeners that authorization is required to open the calendar.

refsect2.title: e_data_cal_notify_error ()
refsect2.para: Notify a calendar client of an error occurred in the backend.

refsect2.title: e_data_cal_notify_attachment_list ()
refsect2.para: Notifies listeners of the completion of the get_attachment_list method call.
